alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Fluvanna; Goochland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 12:24AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cumberland, northwestern Goochland and Fluvanna Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1224 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Centenary, or 10 miles west of Fork Union, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fork Union around 1240 AM EDT. Palmyra and Lakeside Village around 1245 AM EDT. Columbia and Duncan around 1250 AM EDT. Fife and Kents Store around 1255 AM EDT. Hadensville around 100 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Dixie, Stage Junction, Three Square, Shores, Irwin, Central Plains, Bremo Bluff, Antioch, Caledonia and Wildwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
